definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: argument, reproof;—´[[ת]] Pr 10:17 + 9 t.; sf. [[תּוֹכַחְתִּי]] Hb Hab 2:1 + 5 t.; [[תּוֹכַחְתּוֹ]] Pr 3:11; pl. [[תּוֹכָחוֹת]] Ps 38:15 + 3 t.; cstr. [[תּוֹכְחוֹת]] Pr 6:23, Ez Eze 25:17; [[תּׂלְחוֹת]] Eze 5:15 (but latter del. Co; given by SS under [[תּוֹכֵחָה]]);—
argument, impeachment, spoken by lips and mouth Ps 38:15, Job 13:6, Job 23:4, Hb Hab 2:1.

reproof, chiding Pr 1:23, Pr 27:5; ‖[[עחה]] Pr 1:25, Pr 1:30; ‖[[מוסר]] Pr 3:11, Pr 5:12, Pr 10:17, Pr 12:1, Pr 13:18, Pr 15:5, Pr 15:10, Pr 15:32; [[מוסר]] ´[[ת]] Pr 6:23 reporoofs for discipline; [[חיים]] ´[[ת]] Pr 15:31 reproof that giveth life; [[אישׁ תוכחוֹת]] Pr 29:1 man of reproofs (who deserves them).
